snippet.title: Six Spring Trend Essentials
snippet.description: After the polar vortex and now freezing temperatures in NYC, warm weather could not come soon enough! I combed through all of the spring looks (for vicarious warmth) and picked out the ones that I thought were the best, most wearable and would ultimately last in your closet for longer [...] read »

snippet.title: Super Bowl XLVIII: How Weather, Proximity Impact Secondary Pricing
snippet.description: Weather forecasts and lack of proximity of the participating teams to the host site are playing major roles in how the secondary prices for Super Bowl XLVIII have fluctuated since the Denver Broncos and Seattle Seahawks earned their tickets to the big game. And the reality is that proximity (or lack [...] read »

snippet.title: Washington, Chicago Are Best Bets For Next Cold Weather Super Bowl
snippet.description: Super Bowl XLVIII went off without a hitch and now every northern city wants its shot. We break down the best candidates. read »

snippet.title: The Business Of Super Bowl XLVIII: Why "Hotel Spikes" Might Be Lower For NYC Super Bowl
snippet.description: When a city hosts a Super Bowl, there are usually considerable spikes in various hotel industry metrics such as occupancy rates, average daily rates, and revenue per available room. But due to a variety of factors, these "hotel spikes" may not be as large for Super Bowl XLVIII at MetLife Stadium [...] read »

snippet.title: Delta's New LaGuardia Hub Revolutionary For NYC Fliers
